item.title: Complex Linear Transformer
item.description: Similarly, Blackfriday does not support LaTeX math and Pandoc does. I have added the MathJax support to this theme (hugo-xmin) but there is a caveat for plain Markdown posts: you have to include math expressions in a pair of backticks (inline: `$ $`; display style: `$$ $$`), e.g., $S_n = \sum_{i=1}^n X_i$.[^1] For R Markdown posts, you do not need the backticks, because Pandoc can identify and process math expressions.
